name: Kill Your Refrigerator
description:
YOU COME HOME AND YOU JUST WANT TO TAKE A NAP BUT OH MY GOD YOUR FRIDGE IS ALIVE OH GOD WHY IS THAT POSSIBLE WHAT IS IT DOING HELP HELP WON'T SOMEONE HELP KILL IT QUICK!!!

Kill Your Refrigerator is a choose-your-own-adventure horror comedy. It's ~10 minutes long and has 4 endings.

It was created as a test for the full-length game SRRT! (Sex Robot Road Trip) and it takes place in the same world as Beretta Mondatta and Banality Man.

CREATED BY

Yoss III (@yossarianiii, yossarianiii.wordpress.com)

KONOL Games (konolgames@gmail.com)
